about_the_game:
You play the role of a gravedigger who takes care of peace and order at the cemetery every day. Your daytime duties seem simple, but they require attention and commitment

However, when darkness falls, the cemetery comes to life in a completely different way. The night brings unexpected challenges – things you don't expect. Every night can surprise you, and you have to be ready to face whatever has decided to go out for an evening walk.


Driving a Melex around the cemetery is not just ordinary transport - time is running out and there are plenty of responsibilities. Sometimes you have to be in a hurry, which means that slightly damaging a tombstone is just... part of the workday.



Assembling coffins is the basis of every day - each one must be carefully prepared, because we never know what we will use it for in the end.



Sometimes the situation at the cemetery requires more than just a shovel and a melex. When things start to get out of control, you need to reinforce yourself.



When the dead decide to leave their graves, your task is clear: gently but firmly guide them back to their resting place. Peace must be restored!



Remember that as a gravedigger you have to be ready for anything.
